Text:
The standard TV episode naming convention used on TPB looks like this:
Breaking.Amish.S01E06.whatever.else.you.wish.to.add
Sorry velvet. The next episodes I post will be in proper format =)
Thanks to frosty for continuing to upload new episodes.  Especially as MP4s.  Been looking all over for this show!  Thanks again.
thanks very much, Im looking forward for your upload of S01E07.
Thank you so much for uploading this!
Goes out of sync at 30 minutes.

@beachboy   I noticed that too after uploading :0 I only watched the first 2 mins when i uploaded just watched the full episode the other day, it gets a little better towards the end of the episode but it is quite noticeable. unfortunately i know nothing of video editing i just downloaded it and put it to better format and uploaded =x  

Sorry guys!!

i got a program for fixing the audio, next upload will not have out of sync audio. unfortunately I cant find a HD version of episode 7 at this time and I do not want to waste mine or anyone elses time with low resolution crap. i should have an HD episode up within a day or two
